place.name: BOYNDIE
place.gazetteerText: Boyndie, coast par., N. Banffshire, 3 miles W. of Banff, 6945 ac., pop. 2004; P.O. at Whitehills. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
